Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Nice beer but shockingly overpriced food. We ordered 2 portions of frites and aside from being â‚¬12 (?!!!?), it was very small, wrapped in paper like a cheap takeaway and not particularly nice. It also arrived as one portion which looked like a normal to small size and when we queried we were told it was both portions!

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: A lovely open setting serving some of the most fun, delicious beers that I have tasted. The smoked farmhouse ale was a delight! I would definitely recommend that any beer lover should spend an afternoon sampling all that they have to offer

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Really interesting hole in the wall. Unique set up & decor. Staff is distant, but the beer is good. Food truck out front. Strange musical performance.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Guys made a great job brewing a tasty beer. Donâ€™t forget - there is no food there - you have to bring/order yours (Thuisbezorgd helps).

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Best beer in a family atmosphere. For craft beer junkies a must visit.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Nice space but don't expect to be drinking 6 month old bottles of IPA in a brewery :(

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: An old butcher revamped into a hip bar where they serve great beers

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Unique place, with amazing beers! Start with Green Cap, and go crazy from there.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: The beers are just okay but lacking depth, but good value for money. The space is nice, they have a room at the back for concerts. It's at a bit of an odd location but still easy to get to with public transport. The space is nice very nice with long communal tables.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: A really amazing tap room and brewery with plenty of awesome punk/metal themed beers. They play some great music and are host to live bands. Got a chance to meet the brewer and he seems like a great guy. I wish them all the best.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Beautiful place, a hidden gem. Great beer, some snacks, and a hip atmosphere.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Great for enjoying craft brews in the sun in spring/summer. The minimalist decor inside is also nice, resembling a butcher's shop. You're welcome to order pizzas, as only a few snacks are offered at the brewpub. â€¦

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: cool place to hang out. Pretty decent beers - definitely some of the best of the new range of micro breweries in Amsterdam. â€¦

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Butchers tears make some good beer, but sometimes there's consistency problems. The tasting room is a little out of the way but it's a cool experience! Unique setting and artwork, free bread and oil, and a solid selection of house beer.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: The advice was right. If you think you're in the wrong place then you're nearby. Urban, rustic feel. The third door I tried was the right one!  Like a damp old shed out back. Make no mistake though....they brew beer here. And the beer is â€¦

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: I didn't like a lot of the beers I tried here but then I am not a big beer drinker. I could still tell they were good partially because everyone around me was really enjoying theirs. Everyone that works here seems to have the same weird taste in what I could only describe as industrial techno.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Nice place and good craft beers. Occasionally a location for small concerts. The bar, situated in a very quiet street, looks like an empty butcher's shop (hence the name). Interesting concept.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Great unique delicious place with awesome atmosphere (for a butcher/school kind of design). But overall the beer is worth coming for, really good and it works, Iâ€™m a little tipsy.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Hidden gem in Zuid! They brew different biers that change from time to time. Nice atmosphere with hip crowd. It counts with a sort of patio. Alternative rock concerts are also hosted sometimes there.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: A hidden gem in Amsterdam. Nondescript place from the outside, interior looks like an old parking lot (probably because it actually was). Serves good beer, at very reasonable prices. Nice outside terrace in the summer.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: 5 stars all damn day! Small batch brewery, family friendly, great brews, there are small snacks available- bread, nuts,  warehouse location with a Hipster feel, felt like some of the breweries back in the states, don't miss this spot.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Perfect beer! A chill place to hang out with your friends. Not the best place for a date, tho... but you always could find a restaurant for this. For a small beer pub â€” just perfect. *Low tourists rate))))

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: IPA and more IPA at this home brewery, converted from a service garage in the Stadionbuurt. The service is very slow, but people don't seem to mind the 20-25 minutes queuing, waiting for the one guy serving beer, punching the order into a â€¦

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: A Great quite place hidden behind a tram station. Their craft beers are all outstanding. It's never too busy there, even on a Friday afternoon

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: great location, great beers, great service.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Good beer, good music, very gezellig - but hard to get to! You can't get there from Havenstraat even though you can see it from Kilo or Mevius; instead, you have to walk all the way back east and then down to Karperweg.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text:
For craft lovers
Ignore the plastic chairs and revel in the purity of a great craft beer

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Nice beer at a really good price, but the bar is basically just a bare room with some chairs. Worth a stop if you are in the area, not really worth a trip to hang out there though

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text:
Great beer, great staff, just needs to be a little bigger.
But
Really worth going to and spending a night there.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Amazing spot where they brew their own beer. Interior design is very sharp and the crew is very helpful and friendly.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Great place, unique. They've extended their bottle selection lately, which is awesome really.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: It is a pretty brewery with great beers, but, they sell a horrible t-shirt. Designer has to be fired right now !!

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Because it is so unexpected and the beers are great this definitely deserves a five star rating. Awesome for kicking back and enjoying quality beers.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Friendly and nice craft beer place hidden away from the tourist crowds.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Cool alternative micro brewery. Worth a visit. Might be the best brewery in town.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Delicious locally brewed beer ðŸ˜Š They put a lot of effort into quality

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Not tried all what it has to offer, but liked the ones I tasted. Location is good. Good place to catch up with friend.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Good craft beers in a super nice and clean space that obviously used to be a butcher shop!

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Great place to chill and sample great beer outside of the busy center.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: This place is a geheimtipp...don't go here please.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Relaxed atmosphere, beers are pretty good and not too expensive.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Well that's quite a hidden secret out there. Plenty of choice, all their own brewings.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Best hole-in-the-wall brewery ever. Please don't ever change!!! :)

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Great beers and friendly staff definitely worth a visit.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Good beer, cool vibes

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Good atmosphere and great craft beers

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: nice and discret place ! beers are good

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Cool little brewery, great beers!

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Friendly bar staff and tasty beers.

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Very good place !

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Great beer

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: Quirky place with craft beers

Name: Butchers Tears

Name: Butchers Tears

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Is a little known Amsterdam brewery. they have a small selection of very good quality beers. very tasty â€¦

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: (Translated by Google) By far the strangest taproom in Amsterdam, but one that you are always happy to have found. After all, it takes a little searching - behind an industrial estate. You should try a beer that is â€˜Monster Soupâ€™ anyway;) â€¦

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Great non tourist place! Tasty beer, not so many people! Recommend ! â€¦

Name: Butchers Tears
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Hidden away on an unsightly business park in Amsterdam South is this garage converted into a tasting room. The interior Butcher's Tears is minimalist and sterile, which makes it look like a slaughterhouse. Not â€¦

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Beautiful beer room, averse to adornment. Nice people, and good, sometimes experimental beers. â€¦
